amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike title V, the Arctic Coastal Plain Domestic Energy Security Act of 2001, from the bill.
amendment.purpose: Part B amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 107-178 to maintain existing protection of the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge by striking language in the bill that repeals the prohibition against energy development in ANWR.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 223 (Roll no. 317).
